video_title: Ever Got Cheated on? Watch this! 【Psych2Go Story Series】
transcript:
[Music]
foreign
[Music]
how can I paint with these colors when
my world feels so Gray
[Music]
I wish I could trust like that again
trust is like painting
it's a journey
relax
see
trust isn't always permanent but every
moment every stroke every color can lead
to a beautiful masterpiece
but how do I know I won't get hurt again
you don't
but avoiding trust also means avoiding
the brightest colors of life
it felt like a stab foreign how do I
move past that
by remembering that one person's actions
don't Define everyone
for every dark shade there's a bright
one waiting
when I was betrayed
I found strength and forgiveness
found solace and self-love
I realize that trust in myself was the
first step to trusting others
[Music]
I still can't find the right color for
trust
that's because trust isn't just one
color
it's a mix of experiences emotions and
moments
[Music]
I have been hurt too
but together
maybe we can find the brighter shades
I realize trust is an ever-evolving art
sometimes it's messy sometimes it's
clear but
always has the potential to be beautiful
your Masterpiece is just beginning
[Music]
are you looking for a cuddly companion
that brings positivity and mental
Wellness to your daily life get your
very own side The Lovable plushie is
here to brighten your days it embodies
the spirit of psych2go and it serves as
a reminder to prioritize your mental
well-being its Green Leaf symbolizes
growth renewal and the importance of
self-care whether it's for yourself or
as a thoughtful gift for a loved one Psy
is ready to be your snugly friend
through all of life's ups and downs by
your side bless you today link is listed
in the description box
